member.summary: Represents an integration point where the data will flow from into the system.

member.name: M:kCura.IntegrationPoints.Contracts.Provider.IDataSourceProvider.GetData(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{kCura.IntegrationPoints.Contracts.Models.FieldEntry},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.String)
member.summary: Determins the Data from the source that will flow into the system.
member.param: The fields that are requested from the data source.
The requested IDs that are expected to be read.
The source providers options that have been previously set.
member.returns: A stream that represents the data based on the requested fields and the requested entryIds.

member.summary: Determins the identifer for the current ids.
member.param: The identifier field used to batch up jobs.
The source providers options that have been previously set.
member.returns: A stream that represents all the ids with just the identifier field.

member.name: T:kCura.IntegrationPoints.Contracts.IStartUp
member.summary: First call made into the app domain to do any setup work required. It is expected that there is only one class that implements this interface per library.

member.summary: The function that will do any setup work.
